mapper.select:
select * from( SELECT g.business_variety as businessVariety, e.code as storeCode, e.name as storeName, s.goods_code as code, g.generic_name as genericName, g.dosage_name as dosageName, g.specification as specification, g.manufacturer as manufacturer, g.unit_name as unitName, g.place as place, s.lot_num as lotNum, ln.product_date as productDate, ln.valid_until as validUntil, s.shelf_id as shelfId, s.shelf_name as shelfName, sum(s.quantity) as stockQuantity, sum(s.usable_quantity) as usableQuantity, gs.maintenance_type as maintanceType, case when 0 = gs.maintenance_cycle_unit then (ifnull(gs.maintenance_cycle, 0)) when 1 = gs.maintenance_cycle_unit then (ifnull(gs.maintenance_cycle, 0) * 30) when 2 = gs.maintenance_cycle_unit then (ifnull(gs.maintenance_cycle, 0) * 365) END AS maintanceCycle, s.last_maintain_time as lastMaintanceDate,
case when 0 = gs.near_effect_period_unit then (ifnull(near_effect_period, 0)) when 1 = gs.near_effect_period_unit then (ifnull(near_effect_period, 0) * 30) when 2 = gs.near_effect_period_unit then (ifnull(near_effect_period, 0) * 365) END AS nearPeriodCycle FROM saas_stock s LEFT JOIN saas_goods g ON s.goods_id = g.id left join saas_lot_number ln on s.lot_id = ln.id left join saas_goods_storage gs on s.goods_id = gs.goods_id left join saas_goods_business gb on s.goods_id = gb.goods_id LEFT JOIN saas_enterprise e on s.enterprise_id = e.id where s.quantity > 0 and gs.maintenance_type = 1 and g.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} and g.owner_id = #{ownerId} group by s.enterprise_id, s.goods_id, s.lot_id, s.shelf_id
union
select * from ( SELECT g.business_variety as businessVariety, e.code as storeCode, e.name as storeName, s.goods_code as code, g.generic_name as genericName, g.dosage_name as dosageName, g.specification as specification, g.manufacturer as manufacturer, g.unit_name as unitName, g.place as place, s.lot_num as lotNum, ln.product_date as productDate, ln.valid_until as validUntil, s.shelf_id as shelfId, s.shelf_name as shelfName, sum(s.quantity) as stockQuantity, sum(s.usable_quantity) as usableQuantity, '1' as maintanceType, case when 0 = gs.maintenance_cycle_unit then (ifnull(gs.maintenance_cycle, 0)) when 1 = gs.maintenance_cycle_unit then (ifnull(gs.maintenance_cycle, 0) * 30) when 2 = gs.maintenance_cycle_unit then (ifnull(gs.maintenance_cycle, 0) * 365) END AS maintanceCycle, s.last_maintain_time as lastMaintanceDate,
case when 0 = gs.near_effect_period_unit then (ifnull(near_effect_period, 0)) when 1 = gs.near_effect_period_unit then (ifnull(near_effect_period, 0) * 30) when 2 = gs.near_effect_period_unit then (ifnull(near_effect_period, 0) * 365) END AS nearPeriodCycle FROM saas_stock s LEFT JOIN saas_goods g ON s.goods_id = g.id left join saas_lot_number ln on s.lot_id = ln.id left join saas_goods_storage gs on s.goods_id = gs.goods_id left join saas_goods_business gb on s.goods_id = gb.goods_id LEFT JOIN saas_enterprise e on s.enterprise_id = e.id where s.quantity > 0 and gs.maintenance_type = 0 and g.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} and g.owner_id = #{ownerId} group by s.enterprise_id, s.goods_id, s.lot_id, s.shelf_id )tab1 where datediff(CURDATE(), validUntil) < (nearPeriodCycle-#{warnDays}) )tab2
